Replace.Text: [COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_BYZANTIUM_GAUL_MOD_DESCRIPTION]Contains two new civilizations and leaders, 2 new world wonders, 1 new map script, and the Dramatic Ages game mode.
